name: The Moairooms
description:
Escape.

You've noclipped into here, and you have a feeling that they're not friendly. Can you get out before they catch up to you?

Look at them.

Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. Look at them. (These monsters are inspired by the likes of the weeping angels and SCP-173)
